name: financial-analysis-for-react
description: Financial-Analysis-for React  The command npx create-react-app react-admin is used to create a new React application using the Create React App (CRA) tool.  Here's a breakdown of what this command does: •  npx: a package runner tool that comes with Node.js. allows to run npm packages without needing to install them globally on your machine. •  create-react-app: React App tool, which sets up a new React application with a default project structure and configuration. It includes build tools and configurations. •  react-admin: name of new React application. You can replace
